## Introduction

This page examines the relationship between life expectancy and population using the Gapminder dataset. We explore how population size is associated with life expectancy across countries over time.

## Data and Visualization

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
gapminder <- read.csv("gapminder.csv")
```

```{r}
ggplot(gapminder, aes(x = population_millions, y = life_expectancy)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.6) +
  scale_x_log10() +
  labs(
    title = "Life Expectancy vs Population",
    x = "Population (millions, log scale)",
    y = "Life Expectancy"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()
```
